triples.name: Diplomacy (game)
triples.relevance: The strategy game requiring natural language negotiation and cooperation that serves as the test domain for evaluating Cicero's performance.

triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: Used to understand player conversations and generate dialogue for negotiation and communication.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Training algorithm that enables the agent to learn optimal strategies through interaction with the game environment.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Planning algorithm that infers player beliefs and intentions to generate strategic action sequences.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Core technique for processing and generating natural language during negotiation and communication with other players.

triples.name: Cicero (agent)
triples.relevance: Novel AI agent that combines language models with strategic reasoning to achieve human-level performance in Diplomacy.
